name: Armourer's Scrap
help_text:
Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity armours. The maximum quality is 20%.
Shift click to unstack.

name: Awakened Sextant
help_text:
Right click this item then left click a Watchstone to apply it.
Shift click to unstack.

name: Awakener's Orb
help_text:
Right click this item, then left click the item you wish to take the influence from, then left click an item of the same item class you wish to apply it to.
Shift click to unstack.
